entry.title: FTTH
entry.summary: Fiber-To-The-Home incoming This year I should supposedly get fiber finally. Onece I get it the fun begins and I’ll most likely start a YouTube channel and definitely get back to streaming. Games I’ll mostly stream are going to be extraction looter shooters ala EFT, GZW, Project L33T and such. Hope to see you. The streams are most likely going to be in Slovenian with occasional English for sur...

entry.title: New Exciting Stuff
entry.summary: New UDM-PRO Router I just bought a new UDM-PRO and now I’m starting my journey to ubiquity for real this time! I’ve always been preashing about the UI stuff, and deployed them, but never had my own. NOW THIS CHANGES! Photos

entry.title: Network Cheat Sheet
entry.summary: Twisted Pair Cables Cheat-Sheet Cable Types Unshielded Twisted Pair (UTP) As the title states, a UTP cable has no shielding. This is the most used and most basic type of cable. The cable contains pairs of wires twisted together to help reduce and prevent electromagnetic interference. Shielded Twisted Pair (STP) STP cables are similar to UTP cables, where the wires are twisted together and ...

entry.title: Windows 11
entry.summary: Najbolj uporabne nastavitve, ki jih je vredno spremeniti na sveže instaliranih Windows 11 Sprememba desnega klika v classic menu 1. Open Regedit by hitting the Windows key and typing regedit. Hit Enter to launch it. 2. Navigate to HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Classes\CLSID 3. Right-click > New > Key, and paste in this name: {86ca1aa0-34aa-4e8b-a509-50c905bae2a2} 4.With the new key you ...

entry.title: Hello World
entry.summary: Pozdravljeni Dobrodošli na moji novi internetni strani! Spremembe Trenutna internetna stran Techserract, ki sem jo sicer imel več kot 10 let in gostoval na Wordpress-u bo uradno dosegla konec življenja. Na začetku sem internetno stran imel kot neke vrste blog, kjer je bila možnost komentiranja na vsako objavo, vendar ni bila stran kaj preveč aktivna in z današnjimi časi obstajajo boljše plat...
